summary: The player spellbook is now determined by what spelltomes the player has in their inventory. Dropping a book or moving it will remove the spell from the player. Player gains spell from adding the book to their inventory.
descriptionHtml:
The player spellbook is now determined by what spelltomes the player has in their inventory. Dropping a book or moving it will remove the spell from the player. Player gains spell from adding the book to their inventory.

compatibility
is with mods that alter spells
is not with mods that alter spelltomes
author: chimeric929
